glossdef.p: An appliance is a dedicated combination of hardware, hardware-resources and software components that fulfills a specific purpose or function.
Physically, it can be provided by a mobile device, by server hardware or by a computer. An appliance is always a dedicated host or network node.

Virtual appliances are software-defined hosts and run on shared hardware resources of a virtualization environment. Virtual appliance are often referred to as virtual machines. A virtual machine can be exported and transferred from a virtualization environment. It is not attached to any hardware.
